text: The 2016–17 First Professional Football League (Bulgarian: Първа професионална футболна лига 2016/17, Parva profesionalna futbolna liga 2016/17) was the 93rd season of top division football in Bulgaria. It was played from 29 July 2016 to 4 June 2017. Ludogorets Razgrad won the tournament. The top scorer was Claudiu Keșerü, with 22 goals. == Regular season == Team Qualification or relegation 1 Ludogorets Razgrad 26 21 4 1 69 19 +50 67 Championship round 2 Levski Sofia 26 15 6 5 38 17 +21 51 Championship round 3 CSKA Sofia 26 13 7 6 35 16 +19 46 Championship round 4 Cherno More Varna 26 12 7 7 30 24 +6 43 Championship round 5 Lokomotiv Plovdiv 26 10 9 7 35 30 +5 39 Championship round 6 Dunav Ruse 26 10 8 8 32 31 +1 38 Championship round 7 Botev Plovdiv 26 10 5 11 36 42 −6 35 Relegation round 8 Beroe Stara Zagora 26 10 5 11 27 28 −1 35 Relegation round 9 Pirin Blagoevgrad 26 10 4 12 30 36 −6 34 Relegation round 10 Vereya 26 8 6 12 22 36 −14 30 Relegation round 11 Slavia Sofia 26 8 4 14 30 45 −15 28 Relegation round 12 Neftochimic Burgas 26 7 5 14 27 37 −10 26 Relegation round 13 Lokomotiv Gorna Oryahovitsa 26 5 7 14 22 39 −17 22 Relegation round 14 Montana 26 3 3 20 16 49 −33 12 Relegation round == Championship round == Points and goals will carry over in full from the regular season. title: 2016–17 First Professional Football League (Bulgaria)
